com.ubudu.sdk

Interface UbuduAreaDelegate

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UbuduDelayedCustomEventHandlingAreaDelegate

    public interface UbuduAreaDelegate
    The delegate used by the SDK to send area messages to the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SERVICE_STARTED 
      static int SERVICE_STARTING 
      static int SERVICE_STOPPED 
      static int SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
      When the manager fails to start, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) When it started successfully, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_STARTED) When it stops, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_STOPPED) If there is no delegate, if if the statusChanged method returns false, then a Toast message is displayed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void areaEntered(UbuduArea enteredArea)
      area entered event (area): This is a raw event.
      void areaExited(UbuduArea exitedArea)
      area exited event (area): This is a raw event.
      void notificationActionTriggeredForEvent(UbuduEvent event, java.lang.String actionIdentifier)
      Called when a custom action button is clicked on the status bar notification
      boolean notifyServer(java.net.URL notificationServerUrl)
      server notification (url): when automatic server notifications sending is disallowed, the SDK sends this message to the application to let it notify the server thru the given url, or be notified.
      void notifyUserForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
      Area notification (notification) when automatic user notification sending is set to `false`.
      void positionChanged(android.location.Location newPosition)
      position changed (new position)
      void ruleFiredForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
      This message is sent to the delegate when the rule proximity conditions are all fulfilled, shouldNotifyUserForEvent returned true and automatica user notification sending is set to `true`.
      boolean shouldNotifyUserForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
      Invoked before notifyUserForEvent is executed.
      boolean statusChanged(int change) 

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE

        static final int SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
        When the manager fails to start, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) When it started successfully, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_STARTED) When it stops, the delegate receives statusChanged(SERVICE_STOPPED) If there is no delegate, if if the statusChanged method returns false, then a Toast message is displayed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final int SERVICE_STARTED
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • statusChanged

        boolean statusChanged(int change)

      • positionChanged

        void positionChanged(android.location.Location newPosition)
        position changed (new position)
        Parameters:
        newPosition - new position

      • areaEntered

        void areaEntered(UbuduArea enteredArea)
        area entered event (area): This is a raw event. An action may or may not be taken by the SDK according to the rules.
        Parameters:
        enteredArea - the area entered

      • areaExited

        void areaExited(UbuduArea exitedArea)
        area exited event (area): This is a raw event. An action may not be taken by the SDK according to the rules.
        Parameters:
        exitedArea - the area exited

      • notifyServer

        boolean notifyServer(java.net.URL notificationServerUrl)
        server notification (url): when automatic server notifications sending is disallowed, the SDK sends this message to the application to let it notify the server thru the given url, or be notified. The delegate must return true to allow the SDK continue processing the actions, or false to abort processing the actions.
        Parameters:
        notificationServerUrl - server notification url
        Returns:
        true to allow the SDK continue processing the actions, false to abort processing the actions.

      • shouldNotifyUserForEvent

        boolean shouldNotifyUserForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
        Invoked before notifyUserForEvent is executed. Gives you the opportunity to stop this event execution.
        Parameters:
        event - event
        Returns:
        true to proceed to the execution of the event, false to stop it.

      • ruleFiredForEvent

        void ruleFiredForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
        This message is sent to the delegate when the rule proximity conditions are all fulfilled, shouldNotifyUserForEvent returned true and automatica user notification sending is set to `true`.
        Parameters:
        event - event

      • notifyUserForEvent

        void notifyUserForEvent(UbuduEvent event)
        Area notification (notification) when automatic user notification sending is set to `false`. the SDK sends this message to the application, to let it custom handle the event. The event.notification is set, and event.notification.payload() contains the payload.
        Parameters:
        event - event

      • notificationActionTriggeredForEvent

        void notificationActionTriggeredForEvent(UbuduEvent event,
                                         java.lang.String actionIdentifier)
        Called when a custom action button is clicked on the status bar notification
        Parameters:
        event - event
        actionIdentifier - identifier of the custom action defined for this rule in the Ubudu Manager platform
